DOC.brief_summary: This unicentric , two cohort , observational transversal study . The purpose study compare QT/QTc interval HIV positive subject receive antiretroviral therapy without HIV ambulatory care set .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison QT/QTc Interval Between Outpatient HIV-Infected Population Antiretroviral Therapy Two Large HIV-Negative Cohorts
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective : The primary objective compare QT/QTc interval HIV positive subject treat antiretroviral therapy follow ambulatory HIV clinic QT/QTc interval : 1. outpatient HIV negative population health center pre-admission one-day surgical clinic . 2. large HIV-free korean population study ECG-ViEW database . Secondary objective : - Evaluate prevalence QTc interval prolongation outpatient HIV positive population comparatively two HIV negative outpatient population available one-day surgical clinic ECG-ViEW database . - Evaluate risk factor associate QTc interval prolongation outpatient HIV positive population compare outpatient HIV negative population population study ECG-ViEW database . - Compare QT/QTc interval prevalence QTc interval prolongation outpatient HIV positive population currently antiretroviral regimen include protease inhibitor versus antiretroviral regimen without protease inhibitor . - Compare QT/QTc interval among outpatient HIV positive population treat protease inhibitor , regard presence absence certain genetic polymorphism may influence pharmacokinetic aspect protease inhibitor .
DOC.criteria: Age eligible study : 1865 year old inclusively Gender eligible study : Both Hospitalised moment recruitment AIDS status Opportunistic infection acquire last 30 day date recruitment Age < 18 year old > 65 year old Followup care oncology clinic Dialysis study period Pregnancy Without antiretroviral therapy History myocardial infarction 3 week precede recruitment Have pacemaker Diagnosed bundle branch block ECG Principal followup care outside CHUM HIV clinic Refusal participate study
